content:
Beverly Hills, CA! I've got you covered.

I've searched online and found a few cobblers in the 90210 area who specialize in shoe repair and can help you with a sole repair and new laces for your Converse sneakers. Here are a few options:

1. **Beverly Hills Shoe Repair**: This shop has excellent reviews on Yelp and Google, with customers raving about their quick turnaround times and quality work. They offer a wide range of services, including sole repair, heel repair, and lace replacement.

Address: 240 S Beverly Dr, Beverly Hills, CA 90212

Phone: (310) 276-4444

2. **The Shoe Cobbler**: With over 30 years of experience, this family-owned business has built a reputation for providing top-notch shoe repair services. They offer a variety of repairs, including sole repair, and also sell shoe care products.

Address: 455 N Canon Dr, Beverly Hills, CA 90210

Phone: (310) 276-0111

3. **Sole Mates Shoe Repair**: This shop has a 4.5-star rating on Yelp and is known for their fast and friendly service. They offer a range of repairs, including sole repair, and also sell new laces and other shoe accessories.

Address: 9665 Wilshire Blvd, Beverly Hills, CA 90212

Phone: (310) 247-7878

Before visiting any of these cobblers, I recommend calling ahead to confirm their hours, prices, and availability. You may also want to ask about their experience with Converse sneakers specifically.

Remember to inspect your shoes carefully before dropping them off, and make sure to get a quote and an estimated turnaround time from the cobbler. Good luck, and I hope your Converse sneakers come back looking like new!
